name: Jota Aviation for BA CityFlyer - London City to Glasgow, BAe 146-200
description:
I take an aircraft which is older than me on this trip! Jota have been leasing aircraft to BA CityFlyer this year to cover planned maintenance of Embraer aircraft. I managed to take one of those flights covered by Jota, and I'm glad I did.

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
